snippet: Manu Ginobili, who said earlier that he would think about retirement after the playoffs, wrote Wednesday on Twitter, “I’m gonna stay with the Spurs for two more years.”
abstract: San Antonio Spurs guard Manu Ginobili posts Twitter feed saying he plans to stay with the Spurs for two more years.
lead_paragraph: Manu Ginobili, who said earlier that he would think about retirement after the playoffs, wrote Wednesday on Twitter, “I’m gonna stay with the Spurs for two more years.”

headline.main: Ginobili Says He’s Staying With the Spurs
headline.print_headline: Ginobili Writes That He’s Staying With Spurs
